Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Urinal \U"ri*nal\, n. [L. urinal, fr. urina urine: cf. F. urinal.] [1913 Webster] 1. A vessel for holding urine; especially, a bottle or tube for holding urine for inspection. [1913 Webster]
2. A place or convenience for urinating purposes. [1913 Webster]
urinal n : a plumbing fixture (usually attached to the wall) used by men to urinate
